content: tumbling blocks baby blanket design by jenny snedeker approximately 32 x 32 81 5 x 81 5 cm worsted weight yarn cyca 4 paton s canadiana 3½ oz/100 g 205 yd/187 m 100% acrylic 4 balls 10615 cherished yellow us size 9 5 5 mm 24 61 cm circular needles or size to obtain correct gauge 18 sts and 24 row = 4 10 cm to save time be sure to check your gauge stitch markers tapestry needle skill level easy abbreviations p purl sm slip marker garter stitch knit every pm place marker st st stockinette stitch row repeat repeat st s stitch es k knit rs right side ws wrong side tumbling blocks © 2016 jenny snedeker all rights reserved 1 tumbling blocks blanket instructions pattern notes blanket can be made with any size yarn depending on the finished size desired yardage and gauge is cast on 140 sts do not join blanket is worked flat given for worsted weight yarn to make the size stated to make blanket smaller or larger add or remove pattern set up row rs k5 pm k to last 5 sts sts in a multiple of 10 pm k5 using stitch markers between each pattern repeat may help make it easier to keep work 9 more row in garter stitch track of stitch pattern begin tumbling blocks pattern row 1 rs k5 * k1 p1 5 times repeat from * to marker k5 row 2 ws k5 *p1 k1 p1 k2 p2 k1 p1 k1 repeat from * to marker k5 row 3 k5 *k1 p1 k3 p3 k1 p1 repeat from * to marker k5 row 4 k5 *p1 k4 p4 k1 repeat from * to marker k5 row 5 to 8 k5 *k5 p5 repeat from * to marker k5 row 9 k5 *k4 p1 k1 p4 repeat from * to marker k5 row 10 k5 *k3 p1 k1 twice p3 repeat from * to marker k5 row 11 k5 *k2 p1 k1 3 times p2 repeat from * to marker k5 row 12 k5 * k1 p1 5 times repeat from * to marker k5 row 13 k5 * p1 k1 5 times repeat from * to marker k5 row 14 k5 *p2 k1 p1 3 times k2 repeat from * to marker k5 row 15 k5 *p3 k1 p1 twice k3 repeat from * to marker k5 row 16 k5 *p4 k1 p1 k4 repeat from * to marker k5 row 17 to 20 k5 *p5 k5 repeat from * to marker k5 row 21 k5 *k1 p4 k4 p1 repeat from * to marker k5 row 22 k5 *p1 k1 p3 k3 p1 k1 repeat from * to marker k5 row 23 k5 *k1 p1 k1 p2 k2 p1 k1 p1 repeat from * to marker k5 row 24 k5 * p1 k1 5 times repeat from * to marker k5 repeat these 24 row 7 more times or to desired size see pattern notes work garter
